OHIO UNIVERSITY’S AM STATION —1340 KC
ALSO OPERATING WOUI-FM —91.5 MC
THE FIRST UNIVERSITY FM STATION IN OHIO
February 11, 1958
OHIO UNIVERSITY
ATHENS, OHIO
'-SECEIVEL
naebheadquarters
Dr. Harry J. Skomia
lli Gregory Hall
U rbana, Illinois
Dear Dr. Skornias
Enclosed you will find a copy of the results of our
listenership survey for which we received a grant from the N.A.E*B#
I would like to know the final disposition of this report and your
impressions of it. We feel that the results are rather significant
as far as our purposes are concerned. Under separate cover, we are
sending a final financial accounting.
Thank you very much for your financial assistance on this
survey. It has been extremely helpful.
IK.
Archie M. Greer
Supervisor of Broadcasting
